alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 6:09PM MST until January 03 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW OVER THE PLAINS... .Snow, heavy at times, will continue over the plains through midnight and then slowly decrease. Further west along the I-25 Corridor and across the higher terrain light snow will continue this evening before ending around midnight. Some light freezing drizzle may occur at lower elevations. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Byers, and Limon. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel may become very difficult to impossible due to heavy snowfall on roadways. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
